data.actual_result: Discord overlay reads that keybind I pressed and opens
data.short_description: Discord overlay reads the keybind when the game is minimized
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch a game and make sure Discord overlay popup shows on the game - Minimize the game by pressing alt+tab (or equivalent) when the game is in fullscreen mode - Press the open overlay keybind (Shift+\`) - Go back to game by clicking on it on the taskbar
